import { isVisible } from '@testing-library/user-event/dist/utils'; import React, { useState } from 'react' import MyButton from '../UI/Button/MyButton' const ListEventList = ({ listEvent, descriptionOutput, visible, setVisible, remove, OpenDescription, time }) => { const rootClasses = ['dela__modal'] if (visible) { rootClasses.push('active'); } return (
{listEvent.map((listEvent, index) =>
{index + 1}. {listEvent.nam} на {time}
Название: {listEvent.title}
{ OpenDescription(listEvent); setVisible(true); }} > Посмотреть описание { remove(listEvent) }} > Удалить
)}
setVisible(false)}>
{ e.stopPropagation() }}> {descriptionOutput.map((delas, index) =>
{index + 1}. {delas.nam} на {time}
Название: {delas.title}

Описание: {delas.main}

)}
) } export default ListEventList
